description: When it comes to carrot cake bites, these are hands down the best! Not only are they no-bake, vegan and gluten-free, but they are made with 5 simple base ingredients plus spices and optional add ins!
keywords: easy energy balls, healthy protein balls
name: Easy No-Bake Carrot Cake Bites (Vegan, GF)
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup oat flour or unflavored protein powder (, you will need 1-2 tablespoons more if using the all maple syrup option)
1/4 cup almond butter (, use sunbutter for nut free)
2 tablespoons maple syrup (, or for sweeter option 1/4 cup maple syrup and no apple sauce)
1-2 tablespoons apple sauce (, test batter consistency first and add to get the texture you want)
2 tablespoons chopped walnuts or pecans (, optional (remove for nut free)
6 tablespoons shredded coconut (, optional for coating)

recipeInstructions.text: Put everything into a bowl and mix well.
Allow to chill in the fridge while you clean up, this helps firm up the batter.
Coat the balls in the coconut if you prefer.
